events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle collided with my sedan at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claims process and answer your questions.
We have officially acknowledged your auto accident claim and will begin reviewing the submitted information promptly.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and your insurance policy documents for verification.
All requested documents, including photos of the collision and the police report, have been uploaded to your claim file.
Our investigation team has initiated a thorough review of the accident circumstances and vehicle damage assessment.
The investigation into your auto accident has been completed, confirming the collision details and liability factors.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the costs of vehicle repairs and any related expenses incurred.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and are reviewing your concerns carefully.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation and review of submitted documents.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to your designated bank account as compensation for damages.
Your auto accident claim case has been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
